trans-unit.source: "Accessible Books" are books that work well for people with impaired vision. With the ePUB format*, it is possible to make "Born Accessible" books that work well for everyone**, regardless of vision. Bloom has the following tools to help you create these books:
trans-unit.note: The * and ** are footnote markers that should remain the same.
trans-unit.target: "Vitabu vifikivu" ni vitabu vinavyowafaa watu wasio na uwezo wa kuona vizuri. Kwa muundo wa ePUB *, kuna uwezekano wa kutengeneza "Born Accessible" vitabu ambavyo huwafaa watu wote **, bila kujali uwezo wa kuona. Bloom ina zana zifuatazo za kukusaidia kuunda vitabu hivi:

trans-unit.source: This tool, the Accessibility Checker, has:
The "Accessibility Checklist" which is where Bloom checks over your book and points you to anything that needs attention, especially for speakers of minority languages.
trans-unit.target: "Orodha ya Upatikanaji" ambayo ni sehemu ambapo Bloom hukagua kitabu chako na kukuelekeza kwa chochote kinachohitaji umakini, haswa kwa watu wanaoungumza lugha zisizozungumzwa na watu wengi.

trans-unit.source: The "Ace by DAISY Checker" searches the actual ePUB generated by Bloom looking for any problems.
trans-unit.target: Kikaguzi cha"Ace na DAISY" hutafuta ePUB halisi iliyotengenezwa na Bloom ikitafuta tatizo lolote.

trans-unit.source: While the ideal is that a single book can serve everyone, the ePUB standard and ePUB readers do not actually support that. They currently only work for blind people who speak a language that is supported by "Text to Speech" (TTS) systems. At this time, TTS is only available for large or commercially interesting languages. Until the standard and accessible readers improve, it is necessary to make special versions of accessible books for minority language speakers. For blind readers to hear the image descriptions, we need to put something special on the page. In this version of Bloom, you do this by clicking the "Include image descriptions on page" checkbox in the Publish:ePUB screen. Future versions may have other options in this area.
trans-unit.target: Ingawaje ni bora kwamba kitabu kimoja kinaweza kuhudumia kila mtu, kiwango cha ePUB na ePUB reader haviungi mkono jambo hilo. Hivi sasa vinafanya kazi tu kwa watu wasioona ambao huzungumza lugha ambayo inasaidiwa na mifumo ya "Maandishi kwa Matamshi" (TTS,kwa Kiingereza). Kwa wakati huu, TTS inapatikana tu kwa lugha kubwa au zile ambazo zinavutia kibiashara. Hadi wakati ambapo vitabu vya kiwango na kufasiriwa vitakapobereshwa, ni muhimu kutengeneza matoleo maalum ya vitabu vya kufasiriwa kwa wazungumzaji wa lugha zinazozungumzwa na wachache. Ili wasomaji vipofu wasikie maelezo ya picha, tunahitaji kuweka kitu maalum kwenye ukurasa. Katika toleo hili la Bloom, unafanya hivyo kwa kubofya kisanduku cha kuangalia "Jumuisha maelezo ya picha kwenye ukurasa" kwenye skrini ya Chapisha: ePUB. Matoleo ya baadaye huenda yakawa na chaguzi zingine katika eneo hili.

This is shown at the bottom of a dialog box. It is paired with an action button like "OK" and it means "do not do the action". In English, this is the same as "Common.CancelProcess", but could be different in your language.
This is identical to Common.Cancel. The duplication was introduced by a mistake.
This is shown at the bottom of a dialog box. It is paired with an action button like "OK" and it means "do not do the action".

If you include "&" (which represents an ampersand) in your translation, it will not be visible in Bloom. Instead, the letter following it will be a keyboard shortcut (e.g., &Cancel means that alt-C can be used to activate the Cancel button.) The letter marked with ampersand is usually the first one but does not have to be. It is important not to mark the same letter in two different controls in the same dialog. If you are not sure, just don't include the "amp;"; the only consequence is that this control cannot be activated using an alt-key shortcut.
Used typically for a button that closes a dialog box. Unlike "OK", "Close" is not agreeing to anything, it's just dismissing the dialog box.
This is shown at the bottom of a dialog box and means to go ahead with some action. It is often paired with "Cancel"

trans-unit.source:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
trans-unit.target:
Faili uliyochagua ni faili “JPEG”. JPEG faili huwa bora zaidi kwa picha na kazi ya sanaa ya rangi. Hata hivyo, JPEG faili huwa tatizo kuu kwa sanaa ya mistari mieusi na mieupe. Matatizo yanajumuisha:
• Siobainika na vitone vya rangi ya kijivuu.
• Faili kubwa, na kuifanya vigumu kusambaza kitabu.
• Iwapo kuna vingi vikubwa JPEG, Bloom huenda isiwe na nafasi ya kutosha ili kutengeneza PDF faili.

Kumbuka: Kwa sababu JPEG ni “hasara”, kubadilisha JPEG kuwa PNG, TIFF, BMP kwa kweli huharibu mambo zaidi. Iwapo hii ni sanaa ya mstari mweusi na mweupe, unataka kupata skani kwa mojawapo ya miundo hiyo.

Tafadhali chagua mojawapo ya yafuatayo, kisha bofya “SAWA”:

trans-unit.target: Tafadhali shikilia kitufe ukielekeza upande wa chini hadi umalize kurekodi
Kifaa cha Kitabu kilicho na Sauti

trans-unit.note: As in, move the selection "BACK"wards to the previous sentence.
As in, play the current audio file to "CHECK" that the audio is OK.

trans-unit.source: Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
trans-unit.note: Please make it match EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.CheckSettings if possible, but without the number
trans-unit.target: Angalia ili kuhakikisha kuwa unarekodi kwenye kifaa kinachofaa na kuwa ngazi hizi zinaonyesha rangi ya buluu:

trans-unit.note: As in, "CLEAR" (or delete) the existing recording file.
This text is shown if an error occurred while running eSpeak. eSpeak is a piece of software that this program uses to do text-to-speech (have the computer read text out loud).
Shown if you open TalkingBookTool and then open the 'Advanced' subsection

trans-unit.source: If you import this recording, it will replace all the audio for this text box.
trans-unit.target: Ukiagiza rekodi hii, itachukua nafasi ya sauti zote kwa kisanduku hiki cha maandishi.

trans-unit.note: Please make it match EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.LookAtSentence if possible, but without the number

trans-unit.source: Bloom is having problems connecting to your microphone. Please restart your computer and try again.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ina tatizo la kuunganisha na maikrofoni yako. Tafadhali washa tena kompyuta yako na ujaribu tena.

trans-unit.note: Please make it match EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.Next if possible, but without the number

trans-unit.source: Record by whole text box, then let Bloom split it into sentences later.
trans-unit.note: Shown if you open TalkingBookTool and then open the 'Advanced' subsection
trans-unit.target: Rekodi kwa kisanduku kizima cha maandishi, kisha wacha Bloom ikigawe katika sentensi baadaye.

trans-unit.source: Please clear all existing recordings on this page before changing modes.
trans-unit.note: Shown if you open TalkingBookTool, make a recording, and then attempt to toggle the "Record by Sentences" input (without first clearing the audio recordings you are about to lose)
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali futa rekodi zote zilizopo kwenye ukurasa huu kabla ya kubadilisha.

trans-unit.source: Please split or clear the existing recording in this text box before changing modes.
trans-unit.note: Shown if you open TalkingBookTool, enable "Record the whole text box...", make a recording, and then attempt to uncheck the "Record the whole text box..." input (without first clearing the audio recordings you are about to lose)
For "split", please use same terminology as in ID: EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.SplitLabel
For "clear", please use same terminology as in ID: EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.Clear
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali gawanya au futa rekodi iliyopo kwenye kisanduku hiki cha maandishi kabla ya kubadilisha hali-tumizi.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, front and back-matter pages must be recorded by sentences.
trans-unit.note: Shown if you open TalkingBookTool and then attempt to toggle the "Record by Sentences" input on an XMatter page
trans-unit.target: Samahani, kurasa za mbele na nyuma lazima zirekodiwe na sentensi.

trans-unit.note: Shown if you open TalkingBookTool and then open the 'Advanced' subsection
trans-unit.target: Onyesha vitufe vya mpangilio wa uchezaji

trans-unit.note: Please make it match EditTab.Toolbox.TalkingBookTool.Speak if possible, but without the number

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong while splitting the recording.
trans-unit.note: This text appears if an error occurs while perfoming automatic splitting of audio (an audio file corresponding to an entire text box will be split into multiple sections, one section per sentence).
trans-unit.target: Hitilafu imetokea wakati wa kugawanya rekodi.

trans-unit.note: This text appears on the button the user can press to trigger automatic splitting of audio. An audio file corresponding to an entire text box will be split into multiple audio files (one per sentence) instead. (Also known as "Forced Alignment" in technical terms)

trans-unit.source: Make an e-book that can play audio recordings while highlighting text.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kitabu cha mtandao ambacho kinaweza kucheza yaliyorekodiwa ukiwa unaangaza maandishi.

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.source: This book is in translate-only mode. If you want to make other changes, click this to temporarily unlock the book.
trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to temporarily unlock a shell book for editing other than translation.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kiko katika hali ya kutafsiri tu. Ikiwa unataka kufanya mabadiliko mengine, bonyeza hii ili kufungua kitabu kwa muda.

trans-unit.note: Title for dialog box showing the message for EditTab.HowToUseHyperlink
User is supposed to choose a file containing HTML that can be embedded in an element of the book.
"Report" as in "Report this problem to Bloom Support"

trans-unit.source: Please move your collection closer to the root of your hard drive and try again. A file Bloom was working with had a path that was too long. This is usually caused by your collection being too deeply nested in many folders on your hard drive.
trans-unit.target: Please move your collection closer to the root of your hard drive and try again. A file Bloom was working with had a path that was too long. This is usually caused by your collection being too deeply nested in many folders on your hard drive.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
trans-unit.target: Bloom imekuwa na tatizo katika kuonyesha kitabu hiki. Hii haimaanishi kuwa kazi yako imepotea, lakini inamaanisha kuwa kuna kitu kimepitwa na wakati, kimepotea, au kimeharibika.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to copy the metadata to {0} image(s): {1}. Try restarting your computer. If that does not fix the problem, please send us a report and we will help you fix it.
trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} will get a number that is the count of how many image files had a problem.
The placeholder {1} will get a list of the names of image files that had a problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kunakili metadata kwa {0} picha: {1}. Jaribu kuiwasha tena kompyuta yako. Ikiwa hiyo haitasuluhisha tatizo hilo, tafadhali tutumie ripoti na tutakusaidia kulitatua.

trans-unit.note: displays as a "toast", {0} is the URL/filename

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shorter wording): Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilishindwa kuanzisha kifaa cha HTTP cha kusikiza ambacho huwa inatumia kuwasiliana na kifaa chake kilichotiwa ndani cha mtandao wa intaneti. Iwapo hii itatendeka hata ingawa ulikuwa tu umefungua upya kompyuta yako, ambia mtu achunguze iwapo una kifaa kinachotumika kwa nguvu ambacho kimewekwa kwenye mtandao. Kifaa hiki kinachotumika kwa nguvu kilicho kwenye mtandao kinaweza kuhitajika kutolewa kabla ya wewe kuweza kutumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please report the problem to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilipata shida kuhifadhi ukurasa. Tafadhali bonyeza Maelezo hapa chini na uturipotie hii. Kisha toka kwenye Bloom, urudi tena, na angalia ikiwa ukurasa ambao umeubadilisha umekosa chochote. Samahani!

trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the current version of Bloom. For example, {0} might be replaced with "4.3"

trans-unit.source: This might be caused by Windows Defender "Controlled Folder Access" or some other virus protection.
trans-unit.note: After an October 2017 windows update, this appears when Bloom opens a collection and tries to write out the collection settings.
trans-unit.target: Hii inaweza kusababishwa na Windows Defender "Udhibiti wa Folda Iliyodhibitiwa" au kinga nyingine ya virusi.

trans-unit.source: This program cannot write to the folder {0}.
trans-unit.note: This only happens on Windows after an October 2017 update, {0} is the folder that Bloom failed to write to.
trans-unit.target: Programu hii haiwezi kuandika kwa folda {0}.

trans-unit.source: Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
trans-unit.target: Kompyuta yako ilikataza Blook kupata kitabu. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi ili kuandaa mfumo wa utenda kazi idhini ya kupata faili hii.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to the latest Bloom (requires Internet connection)
trans-unit.note: This is a link that will take them to the Downloads (Installers) web page
trans-unit.target: Boresha kwa Bloom ya hivi karibuni (inahitaji muunganisho wa mtandao)

trans-unit.source: There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please report the problem to us.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added spaces): There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuchagua kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please report the problem to us.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added spaces): There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza upya kitabu. Kufungua upya Bloom kunaweza kusuluhisha tatizo hili. Iwapo haitawezekana, tafadhali kliki kifute cha 'Maelezo' na uripoti tatizo kwa Wataalamu husika wa Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This book requires Bloom {0} or greater because it uses the following features:
trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the required version of Bloom. For example, {0} might be replaced with "4.4"
A bulleted list of features (in English) will follow underneath this text
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kinahitaji Bloom {0} au zaidi kwa sababu kinatumia vipengele vifuatavyo:

trans-unit.source: This book requires Bloom {0} or greater because it uses the feature "{1}".
trans-unit.note: The placeholder {0} represents the required version of Bloom. For example, {0} might be replaced with "4.4"
The placeholder {1} represents a short description of the feature For example, {1} might be replaced with "Whole Text Audio"
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kinahitaji Bloom {0} au zaidi kwa sababu kinatumia kipengele "{1}".

trans-unit.source: Bloom book folders must have only one file ending in .htm. In the book "{0}", these are the files ending in .htm:
trans-unit.note: {0} will get the name of the book
trans-unit.target: Folda za kitabu cha Bloom lazima ziwe na faili moja tu inayoishia kwa .htm. Katika kitabu "{0}", hizi ni faili zinazoishia kwa .htm:

trans-unit.source: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} will get the name of the book, {1} will give a link to open the Bloom Library Web page.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, removed period): {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}.
trans-unit.target: {0} huhitaji tafsiri mpya zaidi ya Bloom. Toa tafsiti mpya ya Bloom kutoka kwa {1}.

trans-unit.source: This book needs a new version of Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kinahitaji toleo jipya la Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}
trans-unit.target: Bloom inapata tatizo katika kufuta picha hii: {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem importing this picture.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilipata tatizo katika kuipokea picha hii

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem importing this video.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilikuwa na tatizo la kuagiza video hii.

trans-unit.source: This book cannot be edited because its folder is read-only.
trans-unit.note: Obsolete as of Bloom 5.3 (no code currently reports this problem, though it's possible we might want to again one day)
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki hakiwezi kuhaririwa kwa sababu folda yake ni ya kusoma tu.

trans-unit.source: Please remove all but one of the files ending in .htm. Bloom will now open this folder for you.
trans-unit.note: This follows the Errors.MultipleHtmlFiles message and a list of HTML files.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali ondoa faili zote isipokuwa moja tu inayoishia kwa .htm. Bloom sasa itakufungulia folda hii.

trans-unit.source: Report this problem to Bloom Support
trans-unit.target: Ripoti tatizo hili kwa Usaidizi wa

trans-unit.source: This Collection called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The collection has been changed to use the default Front/Back Matter pages.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, reworded): This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer. You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kilihitaji seti ya machapisho ya Mbele/Nyuma iitwayo '{0}', lakini Bloom haikuipata kwenye kompyuta hii. Unaweza kuweka Seti ya Bloom itakayokupa '{0}', au uende kwa Mpangilio:Kutengeneza Kitabu na ubadilishe kuwa seti tofauti ya machapisho ya Mbele/Nyuma.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the 'toast' that pops up to notify the user of a non-fatal problem.

trans-unit.source: This book called for a Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but this version of Bloom does not have it, and Bloom could not find it on this computer. The book has been changed to use the Front/Back Matter pages from the Collection Settings.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kilihitaji kifurushi cha Mbele / Nyuma kiitwacho '{0}', lakini toleo hili la Bloom halina, na Bloom haikuweza kuipata kwenye kompyuta hii. Kitabu kimebadilishwa ili kutumia kurasa za Mbele / Nyuma za kutoka kwenye Mipangilio wa mkusanyiko.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kujifungua inavyofaa, na dalili hii imeonekana kwenye mashine zilizowekwa King'ora cha Eneo. Kumbuka: kuzima King'ora cha Eneo hakusaidii. Wala kufungua upya huku kikiwa kimezimwa. Kitu fulani kuhusu uwekaji wa King'ora cha Eneo husababisha tatizo, na hivyo kukitoa king'ora cha eneo tu kumeonyesha kusuluhisha tatizo.

trans-unit.source: The metadata inside this font indicates that it is legal to use for all Bloom purposes.
trans-unit.note: This shows in the popup when hovering over a useable font.
trans-unit.target: Metadata iliyo ndani ya fonti hii yaonyesha kuwa ni halali kutumika kwa madhumuni yote ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot determine what rules govern the use of this font. Please read the license and make sure it allows embedding in ebooks and the web. Before publishing to bloomlibrary.org, you will probably have to make a special request to the Bloom team to investigate this font so that we can make sure we won't get in trouble for hosting it.
trans-unit.note: This shows in the popup when hovering over a font when Bloom can't determine if it is useable legally.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kubainisha ni sheria gani zinazosimamia matumizi ya fonti hii. Tafadhali soma leseni na uhakikishe kwamba inaruhusu kupachika katika vitabu vya kielektroniki na wavuti. Kabla ya kuchapisha kwa bloomlibrary.org, itabidi utume ombi maalum kwa timu ya Bloom kuchunguza fonti hii ili tuhakikishe kuwa hatutapata taabu kwa kuiandaa.

trans-unit.source: This font is in a file format that Bloom cannot use for ebooks. Please use a different font.
trans-unit.note: This shows in the popup when hovering over a font that Bloom can't legally host on its website.
trans-unit.target: This font is in a file format that Bloom cannot use for ebooks. Please use a different font.

trans-unit.source: The metadata inside this font tells us that it may not be embedded for free in ebooks and the web. Please use a different font.
trans-unit.note: This shows in the popup when hovering over a font that Bloom can't legally host on its website.
trans-unit.target: Metadata iliyo ndani ya fonti hii inatuambia kuwa huenda isipachikwe bila malipo katika vitabu vya kielektroniki na wavuti. Tafadhali tumia fonti tofauti.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the popup before the types of variants in the font (e.g. bold, italic).
This shows in the popup before the font's version number.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added dots): About Bloom
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shortened): Request a Feature (web)
{0} is a placeholder for the image filename

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: Sehemu ya Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, inaonekana kupotea. Hii inazuia kuonekana kwa onyesho la awali na uchapishaji. programu ya antivairasi wakati mwingine hufanya hivi. Unaweza kuhitaji usadizi wa kifundi ili kukarabati uwekaji wa Bloom na kuzuia faili hii kufutika tena.

trans-unit.source: Cannot replace mp3 file. Check antivirus
trans-unit.note: short message for a popup toast notification
trans-unit.target: Haiwezi kubadilisha faili ya mp3. Angalia kinga ya virusi

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not replace an mp3 file. If this continues, check your antivirus.
trans-unit.note: longer message for a detailed description of the problem
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuchukua nafasi ya faili ya mp3. Ikiwa hili itaendelea, angalia antivirus yako.

trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added space): Converting to mp3

trans-unit.source: This script is right to left
trans-unit.target: Hati hii imeandikwa kutoka kulia kwenda kushoto
Hati hii inahitaji mistari mirefu zaidi

trans-unit.target: No one can modify or copy it without explicit permission. We will not be sharing it via Bloom Reader or BloomLibrary.org.

trans-unit.target: The license of the original book does not allow changing the license in new versions.

trans-unit.target: You may use this space to clarify or grant additional permissions (for example, that translations are allowed), but not to alter the license.

trans-unit.target: Ninakubaliana na Masharti ya matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot save files inside the collection folder ({0}). Please choose another location.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a placeholder for the actual collection folder string.
trans-unit.target: Bloom cannot save files inside the collection folder ({0}). Please choose another location.

trans-unit.source: There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\nPlease pick a unique name.
trans-unit.target: Tayari kuna mkusanyiko ulio na jina kama hilo, kwenye {0}.\nTafadhali chagua jina la kipekee.

trans-unit.source: Choose the main language for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Chagua lugha kuu ya Mkusanyiko huu
Kwa mfano: "Vitabu vya Afya", "PNG Hadithi za Wanyama"

trans-unit.source: What would you like to call this collection?
trans-unit.target: Je, ungependa kuupa mkusanyiko huu jina lipi?

trans-unit.source: OK, that's all we need to get started with your new '{0}' collection.\nClick on the 'Finish' button.
trans-unit.note: {0} is the name of the new collection
trans-unit.target: Sawa, hayo tu ndio tunahitaji ili kuanza mkusanyiko wako mpya wa '{0}'. \nBonyeza kitufe cha 'Maliza'.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
trans-unit.target: Iwapo tayari una mkusanyiko ambao ungependa kufungua, kliki kwenye kifute cha 'Batilisha'.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa sheli au vitabu vya vigezo katika lugha moja au zaidi za mawasiliano mapana. Utaweza kuziweka sheli hizi kwenye BloomLibrary.org. Pia unaweza kutengeneza Seti ya Bloom kuwapa wengine ili waweze kutengeneza vitabu kwa lugha ya mama kutoka kwa sheli zako.
Mkusanyikko wa Lugha ya mama/Lugha ya eneo

trans-unit.source: A collection of books in a local language.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko wa vitabu katika lugha ya eneo.

trans-unit.source: These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
trans-unit.target: Hizi sio za lazimaBloom itaziweka mahali panapofaa kwenye ukurasa wa mada ya vitabu utakavyotengeneza.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
You are almost ready to start making books.
In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufanya mambo kuwa rahisi na kuwa yenye mpangilio, Bloom huweka vitabu vyote unavyotengeneza kwenye Mkusanyikommoja au zaidi. Jambo la kwanza tunalopaswa kufanya ni kukutengenezea moja.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom iligundua kuwa mkusanyiko huu uko kwenye folda yako ya dropbox. Hii inaweza kusababisha matatizo kwa kuwa wakati mwingine dropboksi wakati mwingine hufungia Bloom kutoka kwa faili zake. Iwapo una matatizo, tunapendekeza kuwa usongeshe mkusanyiko wako mahali pengine au uizime dropboksi yako utakapokuwa ukitumia Bloom.

trans-unit.source: This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
trans-unit.target: Mkusanyiko huu ni sehemu ya 'Vyanzo vya vitabu vipya' ambavyo unaweza kuviona chini upande wa kushoto wa Nembo ya Mkusanyiko. Haiwezi kufunguliwa ili kuhakikiwa.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

trans-unit.source: Browse for another collection on this computer
trans-unit.target: Tafuta kwa kutumia mtandao mkusanyiko mwingine ulio kwenye kompyuta hii

trans-unit.source: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
trans-unit.target: Nakili kutoka kwa Chorus Hub kwenye Mfumo wa mtandao wa Eneo
Nakili kutoka kwa Kiendesha mtambo cha USB

trans-unit.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

trans-unit.source: Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\nUse one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\nLater, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.
trans-unit.target: Je, kuna yeyote ambaye ametumia Tuma/Pokea kutumia mkusanyiko na wewe?\nTumia mojawapo wa vifute hivi vya rangi nyekundu ili kunakili mkusanyiko wake kwenye kompyuta yako.\nBaadaye, tumia Tuma/Pokea ili kuwatumia tena kazi yako.
Badilisha lugha ya kiolesura cha mtumiaji

trans-unit.source: Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
trans-unit.target: Kurasa haziwezi kupangwa upya unapotafsiri kitabu.
Mkataba wa Leseni ya Profaili ya Rangi ya Adobe

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sharing a book over wifi, over a usb cable, or uploading.
This is shown while Bloom is sharing a book over wifi or over a usb cable.

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe ili Bloom iweze kuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika. Hadi hapo, bado unaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na ukifungue kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: Hilo sio jambo la kawaida... Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe kilionyesha kuwepo kwa hitilafu katika harakati ya kujaribu kuonyesha hiyo PDF. Bado unaweza kujaribu kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Ripoti Mbaya. Bloom haikuweza kupata Kifaa cha Adobe cha Kusoma ili kuonyesha hapa, hivyo Bloom haiwezi kukuonyesha kitabu chako kilichokamilika.\nTafadhali toa tafsiri ilioko ya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe' na uweke upya 'Kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe'.\nHadi utakapoweza kufanya hivyo, bado uaweza kuhifadhi PDF Kitabu na kukifungua kwenye programu nyingine.

trans-unit.source: You can use sharing apps like email, Dropbox, and WhatsApp to get your .bloomd file onto a device.
trans-unit.target: Unaweza kutumia programu za kushiriki kama vile barua pepe, Dropbox, na WhatsApp kupata faili yako ya .bloomd kwenye kifaa.

trans-unit.source: You can use SD cards and sharing apps like email, Google Drive, and WhatsApp to get your .bloompub file onto a device that has Bloom Reader (Android) or BloomPUB Viewer (Windows). You can also create a stand-alone app using Reading App Builder.
trans-unit.note: The 3 links should be left untranslated as well as the file type '.bloompub'. Beware of machine translations that eliminate the 'b'.
trans-unit.target: You can use SD cards and sharing apps like email, Google Drive, and WhatsApp to get your .bloompub file onto a device that has Bloom Reader (Android) or BloomPUB Viewer (Windows). You can also create a stand-alone app using Reading App Builder.

trans-unit.source: Note that when you upload your book to BloomLibrary.org, we will create a BloomPUB file for you that people can download.
trans-unit.note: The link should be left untranslated as well as the file type 'BloomPUB'.
trans-unit.target: Note that when you upload your book to BloomLibrary.org, we will create a BloomPUB file for you that people can download.

trans-unit.source: To Send via USB, you may need to get the right cable, install phone drivers on your computer, or modify settings on your phone.
trans-unit.target: Kutuma kupitia USB, huenda ukahitaji kupata kebo inayofaa, sakinisha kiendeshaji cha simu kwenye kompyuta yako, au rekebisha mipangilio kwenye simu yako.

trans-unit.source: On the Android device, run Bloom Reader, open the menu and choose 'Receive books via USB'.
trans-unit.target: Kwenye kifaa cha Android, endesha Bloom Reader, fungua menyu na uchague 'Pokea vitabu kupitia kifaa cha USB'.

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to start a temporary one.
trans-unit.note: This is preceded by a heading that says 'No Wi-Fi Network'. 'one' here refers to 'Wi Fi' network.
trans-unit.target: Kuna njia kadhaa za kuanza moja ya muda mfupi.

trans-unit.note: Help link under Motion Book checkbox
A heading in the Publish to Android screen.
trans-unit.target: Rafu ya vitabu ya Bloom Reader

trans-unit.source: To publish this book, Bloom must check which languages the copyright owner has permitted, but Bloom is having trouble reaching the server that has this information.
trans-unit.target: Ili kuchapisha kitabu hiki, Bloom lazima iangalie ni lugha zipi mmiliki wa hakimiliki ameruhusu, lakini Bloom ina shida kufikia seva iliyo na ujumbe huu.

trans-unit.source: Choose landscape to activate Motion Book mode
trans-unit.note: Appears in portrait mode when Motion checkbox is checked
trans-unit.target: Chagua kurasa mlalo ili kuanzisha hali ya Kitabu cha Msogeo

trans-unit.note: This is the heading above various buttons that control the publishing of the book to Android.
The second heading in the Settings section, which shows a checklist of various features.

trans-unit.source: The copyright holder of this book has not licensed it for publishing in {0}. Please contact the copyright holder to learn more about licensing.
trans-unit.note: {0} will be a language name or a list of them
trans-unit.target: Mmiliki wa hakimiliki ya kitabu hiki hajaipa leseni ya kuchapishwa katika {0}. Tafadhali wasiliana na mwenye hakimiliki ili upate maelezo zaidi kuhusu leseni.

trans-unit.source: Checking {0} font: License OK for embedding.

trans-unit.note: {1} is a number with one decimal place, the number of megabytes the font file takes up

trans-unit.source: This book has text in a font named \"{0}\". Bloom cannot publish this font's format ({1}).
trans-unit.note: {0} is a font name, {1} is a file extension (for example: .ttc)
trans-unit.target: This book has text in a font named \"{0}\". Bloom cannot publish this font's format ({1}).

trans-unit.source: This book has text in a font named \"{0}\". The license for \"{0}\" does not permit Bloom to embed the font in the book.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kina maandishi katika fonti iitwayo \"{0}\". Leseni ya \"{0}\" hairuhusu Bloom kupachika fonti kwenye kitabu.

trans-unit.source: This book has text in a font named \"{0}\", but Bloom could not find that font on this computer.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kina maandishi katika fonti inayoitwa \"{0}\", lakini Bloom haikuweza kupata fonti hiyo kwenye kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.source: Packaging "{0}" for use with Bloom Reader...
trans-unit.target: Upakiaji "{0}" wa kutumiwa na Bloom Reader...

trans-unit.note: Link to find Bloom Reader on Google Play Store

trans-unit.note: This is displayed at the top of the Android screen.
trans-unit.target: Tuma Kitabu chako kwenye programu ya Android ya Bloom Reader

trans-unit.source: Choose how to send to device
trans-unit.note: There are several methods for pushing a book to android. This is the heading above the chooser.
trans-unit.target: Chagua jinsi ya kutuma kwa kifaa

trans-unit.note: Which languages will have the "Talking Book" (books with both text and narrated audio) feature enabled
The heading at the top of the Settings section, which shows a thumbnail of the front cover and can be used to change the underlying page color.

trans-unit.source: You can now read "{0}" in Bloom Reader!
trans-unit.target: Sasa unaweza kusoma "{0}" katika Bloom Reader!

trans-unit.note: {0} is a the name of the device Bloom connected to

trans-unit.source: The device reported that it does not have enough space for this book. The book is {0} MB.
trans-unit.note: {0} is the size of the book that Bloom is trying to copy over to the Android device.
trans-unit.target: Kifaa kiliripoti kuwa hakina nafasi ya kutosha kwa kitabu hiki. Kitabu ni {0} MB.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred and the book was not sent to your Android device.
trans-unit.target: Hitilafu ilitokea na kitabu hakikutumwa kwa kifaa chako cha Android.

trans-unit.source: Looking for an Android device connected by USB cable and set up for file transfer (MTP)...
trans-unit.note: This is a progress message; MTP is an acronym for the system that allows computers to access files on devices.
Prior to 5.0, this was "Looking for an Android device connected by USB cable and set up for MTP..."
trans-unit.target: Inatafuta kifaa cha Android kilichounganishwa na kebo ya USB na kusanidiwa kwa MTP...

trans-unit.source: Please connect only one of the following devices.
trans-unit.note: Prior to 5.0, this was "The following connected devices all have Bloom Reader installed. Please connect only one of these devices."
trans-unit.target: Vifaa vifuatavyo vilivyounganishwa vyote vimewekwa Bloom Reader. Tafadhali unganisha moja tu ya vifaa hivi.

trans-unit.source: Packaging "{0}" for use with Bloom Reader...
trans-unit.target: Upakiaji "{0}" wa kutumiwa na Bloom Reader...
Inatuma "{0}" kwenye kifaa chako cha Android...

trans-unit.source: Unable to connect to any Android device.
trans-unit.note: Prior to 5.0, this was "Unable to connect to any Android device which has Bloom Reader."
trans-unit.target: Imeshindwa kuunganisha kwenye kifaa chochote cha Android ambacho kina Bloom Reader.

trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to send the book to a device via USB cable.

trans-unit.source: Got a book request we could not process. Possibly the device is running an incompatible version of BloomReader?
trans-unit.target: Tuna ombi la kitabu ambacho hatukuweza kushughulikia. Labda kifaa kinaendesha toleo lisilokubaliana na BloomReader?

trans-unit.source: Sending the book failed. Possibly the device was disconnected? If you can't see a reason for this the following may be helpful to report to the developers:
trans-unit.target: Kutuma kitabu hakukufaulu. Inawezekana kifaa kilitenganishwa? Ikiwa huwezi kuona sababu ya hii yafuatayo yanaweza kusaidia kuripoti kwa watengenezaji:

trans-unit.note: {0} is the name of the book, {1} is the name of the device
{0} is the name of the book, {1} is the name of the device

trans-unit.source: On the Android, run Bloom Reader, open the menu and choose 'Receive Books via WiFi'.
trans-unit.note: Prior to 5.0, this was "On the Android, run Bloom Reader, open the menu and choose 'Receive Books from computer'."
trans-unit.target: Kwenye Android, endesha Bloom Reader, fungua menyu na uchague 'Pokea Vitabu kutoka kwa kompyuta'.

trans-unit.source: You can do this on as many devices as you like. Make sure each device is connected to the same network as this computer.
trans-unit.target: Unaweza kufanya hivyo kwenye vifaa vingi unavyopenda. Hakikisha kila kifaa kimeunganishwa kwenye mtandao sawa na kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.source: Advertising book to Bloom Readers on local network...
trans-unit.target: Kutangaza kitabu kwa programu za Bloom reader kwenye mtandao wa ndani...

trans-unit.note: Button that tells Bloom to begin offering this book on the wifi network.

trans-unit.source: The layout of this book is currently "{0}". Bloom Reader will display it using "{1}", so text might not fit. To see if anything needs adjusting, go back to the Edit Tab and change the layout to "{1}".
trans-unit.target: Mpangilio wa kitabu hiki kwa sasa ni "{0}". Bloom Reader itauonyesha kwa kutumia "{1}", kwa hivyo maandishi yanaweza kosa kutoshea. Ili kuona ikiwa kuna kitu kinachohitaji kurekebishwa, rudi kwenye Kichupo cha Hariri na ubadilishe mpangilio kuwa "{1}".

trans-unit.note: This is shown in the 'Save' dialog when you save a bloom book in the format that works with the Bloom Reader Android App

trans-unit.source: Some audio elements are missing ids
trans-unit.note: Message briefly displayed to the user in a toast
trans-unit.target: Baadhi ya vipengele vya sauti havina vitambulisho

trans-unit.note: This is the label under the BloomPUB icon on the left side of the Publish screen.

trans-unit.source: Make a BloomPUB for Bloom Reader or Reading App Builder.
trans-unit.target: Make a BloomPUB for Bloom Reader or Reading App Builder.

trans-unit.source: BloomPUBs are a kind of eBook that can be read on phone apps ([Bloom Reader](https://bloomlibrary.org/page/create/bloom-reader) and [Reading App Builder](https://software.sil.org/readingappbuilder/)) and on Windows using [BloomPUB Viewer](https://bloomlibrary.org/page/create/downloads#related-software). They offer many advantages over ePUBs, including WYSIWYG fidelity and the full range of Bloom digital book features.
trans-unit.note: Task description at the top of the BloomPUB Publishing page
trans-unit.target: BloomPUBs are a kind of eBook that can be read on phone apps ([Bloom Reader](https://bloomlibrary.org/page/create/bloom-reader) and [Reading App Builder](https://software.sil.org/readingappbuilder/)) and on Windows using [BloomPUB Viewer](https://bloomlibrary.org/page/create/downloads#related-software). They offer many advantages over ePUBs, including WYSIWYG fidelity and the full range of Bloom digital book features.

trans-unit.source: Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book.\nPages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, add newline): Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza kijitabu kutokana na kurasa za ndani za kitabuKurasa zitatolewa na kupangwa upya ili utakapokikunja, utakuwa na kijitabua.\n

trans-unit.note: This link opens a dialog box that lets you put in information someone (often a librarian) might use to search for a book with particular characteristics.

trans-unit.source: This file will cause these books to be grouped under a single bookshelf in Bloom Reader. This collection's bookshelf is set to "{0}".
trans-unit.note: {0} will be replaced with the name of the bookshelf. Make sure to place the {0} at the appropriate place in the translation. The double quotes ("") around it can be replaced with whatever kind of quotation marks are appropriate in the language you are translating to.
trans-unit.target: Faili hii itasababisha vitabu hivi kupangwa chini ya rafu moja ya vitabu katika Bloom Reader. Rafu ya vitabu ya mkusanyiko huu imewekwa kuwa "{0}".

trans-unit.note: "Make" is the label of a button that will make the selected file
A BloomPUB is a type of file format that can be used to read books on the Bloom Reader app
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza BloomPUB Zote kutoka kwa Mkusanyiko

trans-unit.note: "Compress" means to take multiple things and turn them into a single combined file. (The result is smaller than the sum of the parts.)
.bloombundle is the file extension. It is in lowercase. It will be the same extension regardless of the user's language settings.

trans-unit.source: Upload your book to BloomLibrary.org so that other people can read it, download it to their devices, and share it with other people.
trans-unit.target: Weka kitabu chako kwenye BloomLibrary.org, ndio watu wengine waweze kukisoma, kukipakua katika vifaa vyao na kukishirikisha na watu wengine.

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza PDF ya mbele tu na nyuma (pande zote), ili uweze kuchapisha kwenye karatasi ya rangi.

trans-unit.note: Used in Epubs as the text of a link that leads from the image description back to the main page

Here, the English 'Accessibility' is a common way of refering to technologies that are usable by people with disabilities. With computers, this usually means people with visual impairments. It includes botht he blind and people who might need text to be larger, or who are colorblind, etc.

trans-unit.source: Make an electronic book that can be read in EPUB readers on all devices.
trans-unit.note: Task description at the top of the ePUB Publishing page
trans-unit.target: Make an electronic book that can be read in EPUB readers on all devices.

trans-unit.note: Shown in a progress box when Bloom is starting to create an ePUB
Used in Epubs as the text of a link that leads to the description of an image

trans-unit.source: Links to other pages do not work in ePUBs. They will be changed to plain text that does not look like a link.
trans-unit.target: Viungo vya kurasa zingine havifanyi kazi katika ePUBs. Zitabadilishwa kuwa maandishi wazi ambayo hayaonekani kama kiungo.
Jumuisha maelezo ya picha kwenye ukurasa
Hakuna maelezo ya picha ya sauti

trans-unit.source: The following pages were removed because they are not supported in ePUBs:
trans-unit.note: Shown in a progress box when Bloom finds interactive pages in an EPUB. Followed by a list of page labels.
trans-unit.target: Kurasa zifuatazo ziliondolewa kwa sababu haziwezi kutumika katika ePUBs:

trans-unit.source: Sorry, Bloom cannot produce ePUBs if there are any overlays. The first overlay is on page {0}.
trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced with the page number (or name of page). For example, it might be replaced by "1" or "Front Cover"
trans-unit.target: Samahani, Bloom haiwezi kutoa ePUB ikiwa kuna viwekeleo vyovyote. Uwekeleaji wa kwanza uko kwenye ukurasa wa {0}.

trans-unit.note: label for the book content in the ePUB's Table of Contents

trans-unit.source: This ePUB preview is provided by [Readium]. This book may render differently in various ePUB readers.
trans-unit.note: [Readium] should be left untranslated as a noun. It will be changed into an HTML link to the Readium web page (https://readium.org/). If the term "Readium" has been translated on a translated version of that web page, then the translated term may be substituted within the square brackets. (Be sure to keep the square brackets [] around Readium or its translation!)
trans-unit.target: Uhakiki huu wa ePUB umetolewa na [Readium]. Kitabu hiki kinaweza kutoa maana tofauti kwa wasomaji anuwai wa ePUB.
Tumia saizi ya maandishi ya kisomaji cha ePUB

trans-unit.source: Make an ePUB (electronic book) out of this book, allowing it to be read on various electronic reading devices.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza ePUB (kitabu cha kielektroniki) kutokana na kitabu hiki, ukikiruhusu kuweza kusomwa kwenye vifaa tofauti vya kusoma vya kielektroniki.

trans-unit.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format
trans-unit.target: Habari kuhusu Muundo wa Ndani wa XML

trans-unit.note: The parenthesized word indicates the negative effect of using this option. This text is for a menu item.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot make booklets using the current page size.
trans-unit.note: If a book has a paper size that is too big (like A4), Bloom does not know how to make booklets with it. So the controls for booklets get disabled and this message is shown.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haiwezi kutengeneza vijitabu kwa kutumia saizi ya ukurasa wa sasa.

trans-unit.source: If you want to print directly from Bloom, you will need to install the free Adobe Reader and then re-start Bloom. Or instead, you can save the PDF, open it in some other program, and then print from there.
trans-unit.target: If you want to print directly from Bloom, you will need to install the free Adobe Reader and then re-start Bloom. Or instead, you can save the PDF, open it in some other program, and then print from there.

trans-unit.source: This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
trans-unit.target: PDF kifaa cha kutazama kinaweza kuboreshwa kwa kuweka kifaa cha kusoma cha Adobe cha bure kwenye kompyuta hii.

trans-unit.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
trans-unit.target: Tengeneza PDF ya kila ukurasa wa kitabu, ukurasa mmoja kwa kila kipande cha karatasi.

trans-unit.source: Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
trans-unit.target: Fungua PDF kifaa cha kutazama kwenye mfumo wa kawaida PDF

trans-unit.note: menu header in the Publish tab
Header for a region of the menu which lists various options useful for jobs that will be printed at a commercial print shop
tooltip for the menu header in the Publish tab
trans-unit.target: Chagua mpangilio jinsi ya kutoa nakala

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to create the PDF file ({0}).{1}{1}Details: BloomPdfMaker (command line) did not produce the expected document.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box. {0} is the filename, {1} is a newline character.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuunda faili ya PDF ({0}). {1} {1} Maelezo: BloomPdfMaker (mstari wa amri) haukutoa hati inayotarajiwa.

trans-unit.source: Bloom requires access to a printer in order to make a PDF, even though you are not printing. Windows gave this error when Bloom tried to access the default printer: {0}
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box. {0} is replaced by a Windows error message at runtime
trans-unit.target: Bloom inahitaji ufikiaji wa printa ili kutengeneza PDF, ingawa hauchapishi. Windows ilitoa hitilafu hii wakati Bloom ilijaribu kupata printa chaguomsingi: {0}

trans-unit.source: Bloom needs you to have a printer selected on this computer before it can make a PDF, even though you are not printing. It appears that you might not have a printer set as the default. Please go to Devices and Printers and select a printer as a default. If you don't have a real printer attached, just select the Microsoft XPS or PDF printers.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Bloom inahitaji uwe na printa iliyochaguliwa kwenye kompyuta hii kabla ya kutengeneza PDF, ingawaje hauchapishi. Inaonekana unaweza kuwa hauna printa iliyowekwa kama chaguomsingi. Tafadhali nenda kwenye Vifaa na Printa na uchague printa kama chaguomsingi. Ikiwa hauna printa halisi iliyoambatanishwa, chagua tu Microsoft XPS au printa za PDF.

trans-unit.source: The book's images might have exceeded the amount of RAM memory available. Please turn on the "Use Less Memory" option which is slower but uses less memory.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed in a message dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Picha za kitabu zinawezakuwa zimezidi kiwango cha kumbukumbu ya RAM iliyopo. Tafadhali washa chaguo la "Tumia Kumbukumbu Ndogo" ambayo iko polepole lakini hutumia kumbukumbu ndogo.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilikuwa na tatizo katika kutengeneza PDF kitabu hiki. Unaweza kuhitaji usaidizi wa kifundi au uwasiliane na wataalamu husika wa Bloom. Lakini hapa ni baadhi ya mambo unayoweza kujaribu:

trans-unit.source: Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ilikuwa na tatizo kutengeneza PDF ya kitabu hiki.

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box

trans-unit.note: Message briefly displayed to the user in a toast

trans-unit.target: Kuchapisha nje ya mpaka wa ukurasa

trans-unit.note: Message displayed in a progress report dialog box
Message displayed in a progress report dialog box, {0} is replaced by the page number

trans-unit.target: Uchapishaji nje ya mpaka wa ukurasa hautumiki kwa uchapishaji wa kijitabu

trans-unit.note: {0} and {1} are HTML link markup. You can think of them as fancy quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: Bloom iliishiwa na kumbukumbu wakati wa kutengeneza PDF. Tazama {0} nakala hii {1} ili upate mapendekezo kadhaa ya kujaribu.

trans-unit.note: displayed as a checkable menu option for the Publish tab, PDF options menu. The content in parentheses may not be translatable. 'CMYK' may not be translatable, it is a print shop standard.

trans-unit.source: The PDF file has not been saved because you chose not to allow producing a "PDF for print shop".
trans-unit.note: explanation that file was not saved displayed in a message box
trans-unit.target: Faili la PDF halijahifadhiwa kwa sababu umechagua kutoruhusu kutengeneza "PDF kwa duka la kuchapisha".

trans-unit.source: Bloom uses Adobe color profiles to convert PDF files from using RGB color to using CMYK color. This is part of preparing a "PDF for print shop". You must agree to the following license in order to perform this task in Bloom.
trans-unit.note: Brief explanation of what this license is and why the user needs to agree to it
trans-unit.target: Bloom hutumia profaili za rangi ya Adobe kubadilisha mafaili ya PDF kutoka kwa kutumia rangi ya RGB na kutumia rangi ya CMYK. Hii ni sehemu ya kuandaa "PDF kwa duka la kuchapisha". Lazima ukubali leseni ifuatayo ili kufanya kazi hii katika Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Page {0} is the first page that uses Overlay elements.
trans-unit.note: The {0} will be replaced by a page number.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa wa {0} ni ukurasa wa kwanza unaotumia vipengele vya Uwekeleaji.

trans-unit.source: In order to publish your book, you need to either activate Bloom Enterprise, or remove the Overlay elements from your book.
trans-unit.target: Ili kuchapisha kitabu chako, unahitaji kuwezesha Bloom Enterprise, au kuondoa vipengele vya Uwekeleaji kwenye kitabu chako.

trans-unit.source: The book titled '{0}' adds new Overlay elements. Overlay elements are a Bloom Enterprise feature.
trans-unit.note: {0} will be replaced with the book's title.
trans-unit.target: Kitabu chenye kichwa '{0}' kinaongeza vipengele vipya vya Uwekeleaji. Vipengele vilivyowekelea ni kipengele cha Bloom Enterprise.

trans-unit.note: displayed as file type for Save File dialog

trans-unit.source: Create video files that you can upload to sites like Facebook and YouTube. You can also make videos to share with people who use inexpensive “feature phones” and even audio-only files for listening.

a heading to select which audio or video format to record

trans-unit.source: Sorry, "{0}" was not successfully uploaded. Sometimes this is caused by temporary problems with the servers we use. It's worth trying again in an hour or two. If you regularly get this problem please report it to us.
trans-unit.target: Samahani, "" haikufaulu kuwekwa. Wakati mwingine hii husababishwa na matatizo yasiyo ya kudumu yanayotokana na vifaa tunavyotumia. Ni muhimu kujaribu tena kwa muda wa saa moja au mbili. Iwapo utapata tatizo hili mara kwa mara tafadhali piga ripoti kwetu.

trans-unit.source: This book has a font, “{0}”, which has the following problem:
trans-unit.note: {0} is replaced by the name of the font. Do not try to translate it.
trans-unit.target: This book has a font, “{0}”, which has the following problem:

trans-unit.source: The font's file cannot be processed by Bloom and may be corrupted or not a font file.
trans-unit.target: The font's file cannot be processed by Bloom and may be corrupted or not a font file.

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot publish ebooks with this font's format ({0}).
trans-unit.note: {0} is replaced by the filename extension of the font (something like ".ttc"). Do not try to translate it.
trans-unit.target: Bloom cannot publish ebooks with this font's format ({0}).

trans-unit.source: The metadata inside this font tells us that it may not be embedded for free in ebooks and the web.
trans-unit.target: The metadata inside this font tells us that it may not be embedded for free in ebooks and the web.

trans-unit.source: BloomLibrary.org will display the PDF and allow downloads for translation, but cannot offer the “READ” button or downloads for BloomPUB or ePUB.
trans-unit.target: BloomLibrary.org will display the PDF and allow downloads for translation, but cannot offer the “READ” button or downloads for BloomPUB or ePUB.

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes.
trans-unit.target: Kwa kuweka, unadhibitisha makubaliano yako na Masharti ya matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom na unaipa haki inayostahili.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako.

trans-unit.source: In the Bloom community, we help each other by sharing both new and newly translated books on the Bloom Library.
trans-unit.target: Katika jamii ya Bloom, tunasaidiana kwa kushiriki vitabu vipya na pia vitabu vipya vilivyotafsiriwa kwenye Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.note: This is added after the language name, in order to indicate that some parts of the book have not been translated into this language yet.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to sign in instead?
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, added space): We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
OLD TEXT (before 4.9, changed log in to sign in): We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: Hatuwezi kukusajili na anwani hiyo, kwa sababu tayari tuna akaunti inayotumia anwani hiyo. Je, ungependa kuingia kwenye akaunti yako badala yake?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haikuweza kuungana na mtandao ili kuthibitisha kuingia kwako. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kukamilisha kuingia kwako akaunti yako au kufungua akaunti mpya. Hii inaweza kuwa tatizo kutokana na uunganishaji wa intaneti, mtandao wetu, au baadhi ya vifaa hapo katikati.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: Ili kufungua akaunti ya BloomLibrary.org, unapaswa kuweka alama kwenye kisanduku ukiashiria kuwa unakubaliana na Sheria za Matumizi ya Maktaba ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: Hatuna kwenye rekodi zetu yeyote anayetumia barua pepe hiyo. Je, ungependa kufungua akaunti?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
trans-unit.target: Neno la siri na jina lako la utambulizo havikuambatana

trans-unit.source: Please agree to terms of use
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali kubaliana na Masharti ya Matumizi

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali weka anwani za barua pepe inayotumika. Tutatuma barua pepe kwa anwani hii ili uweze kubadilisha neno lako la siri.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuunganishwa na mtandao ili kubadilisha neno lako la siri. Tafadhali angalia intaneti yako.
Ubadilishaji wa neno la siri umefeli

trans-unit.target: Tunatuma barua pepe kwa {0} ikiwa na maagizo ya jinsi ya kubadilisha neno lako la siri.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not sign in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom haijaweza kuingia kwa BloomLibrary.org kutumia hati zako za utambulisho zilizohifadhiwa. Tafadhali angalia unganisho lako la mtandao.

trans-unit.source: Sign up or sign in to BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 4.9, added "sign in" and changed "log in" to "sign in"): Log in to BloomLibrary.org

We have kept the old message ID since a translation of that will be better than nothing. The terminology should ideally match the buttons in the dialog, which we don't control, such as "Sign in with Google", but so far we haven't been able to get those localized.

trans-unit.target: Kutengeneza picha ya ukucha wa dole gumbai...

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Kupeana leseni bunifu ya Kawaida huifanya rahisi kwako kupeana idhini fulani kwa kila mtu.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Pendekezo: Leseni Bunifu za Kawaida, hufanya kuwa rahisi zaidi kwa wengine kutumia kitabu chako, hata kama hawana ufasaha katika lugha yako ya leseni ya kawaida.

trans-unit.source: This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.\n\nDo you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.note:
OLD TEXT (before 4.0, mark newlines properly): This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.
Do you want to go ahead?
trans-unit.target: Kitabu hiki kinaonekana kuwa kiolezo, ya kwamba, kina kurasa tupu za kuandikia kitabu kipya badala ya yale yaliyomo kutafsiriwa katika lugha zingine. Ikiwa haukukusudia hivyo, unapaswa kupata msaada wa wataalam kabla ya kupakia kitabu hiki. \n\nJe, unataka kuendelea?

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.
trans-unit.target: Kulikuwa na tatizo katika kuweka kitabu chako. Hii huenda ikawa ni kwa sababu kompyuta yako imeundwa ili kutumia wakati usio sahihi wa eneo au saa yako ya mfumo ni mbaya sana. Tazama http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html jinsi ya kurekebisha hii.

trans-unit.note: {0} is a number. A heading for several items each of which specfies a maximum for a different quantity for a reader of the level specified by the number.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Letters". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum letters in any word". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
Prior to 4.9, was "Maximum Average Length of Sentences in Book"
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Words". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum averate sentence length in book". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Words". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum average words per page" (in book is implied). Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Sentences". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum sentences per page". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Letters". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum letters in any word". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Sentences". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum sentences per page". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
OLD TEXT (before 3.9, reworded): Maximum Unique Words per Book
trans-unit.target: Idadi ya juu zaidi ya maneno ya kipekee kwenye kitabu

trans-unit.note: follows headings like "Level 1 Maximum" and "Words". Should combine with those to convey "Maximum unique words in book". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.
Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words". Table cells contain values like 23(10) indicating that 23 is the maximum number of words allowed in a book (counting repeated words), and 10 is the maximum number of unique words (not counting repeats).

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words" or "Sentences". Table cells contain values like 7(5) indicating that 7 is the maximum number of words (or sentences) on a page, and 5 is the maximum average number across all pages.

This is a header in a table, under another heading "Words". Table cells contain values like 3(2) indicating that 3 is the maximum number of words in any sentence, and 2 is the maximum average words per sentence.
This is a header in a table, under another heading "Letters". Table cells contain values like 7(5) indicating that 7 is the maximum length of any word, and 5 is the maximum average length of words.

trans-unit.target: , Injini ya Kutafuta ya Kusoma na Kuandika.
Herufi za hapo awali na zile mpya

trans-unit.note: follows headings "maximum" and "words" to convey "maximum words per sentence". Surround text that should be bold in double asterisks.

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
trans-unit.target: Bloom tayari inajua ni herufi gani katika lugha za ulimwengu kila wakati zinaashiria mwisho wa sentensi. Ili kuongeza zingine, ingiza herufi ya Unicode hapa. Kwa mfano kwa lugha za maandishi ya Thai, ingiza \ U0020 kuambia Bloom kwamba nafasi za kawaida hutumiwa kuvunja sentensi.

Andaa kifaa cha kusoma kilichopewa ngazi

trans-unit.source: Please help us reproduce this problem on our computers.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali tusaidie kutoa tena tatizo hili kwenye kompyuta zetu.

trans-unit.source: Your report will go into our issue tracking system and will be visible via the web. If you have something private to say, please email to '{0}'.
trans-unit.note: The {0} is where the Bloom team's private email address will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Ripoti yako itaingia kwenye mfumo wetu wa ufuatiliaji wa maswala na itaonekana kupitia wavuti. Ikiwa una jambo la faragha la kusema, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will include diagnostic information with your report. Your report will not be private.
trans-unit.target: Bloom itajumuisha habari ya uchunguzi na ripoti yako. Ripoti yako haitakuwa ya faragha.

trans-unit.note: Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission, if there was a fatal error and we need to exit the program.
Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

trans-unit.source: See what else will be submitted
trans-unit.target: Tazama ni nini kingine kinapaswa kupeanwa

trans-unit.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

trans-unit.source: We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
trans-unit.target: Tulipokea ripoti yako, asante kwa kutenga muda wako ili kusaidia Bloom kuwa bora zaidi!

trans-unit.note: The title of the dialog when a user chooses to Report a Problem.

trans-unit.source: What seems to be the problem?
trans-unit.target: Je, ni nini inaonekana kuwa tatizo?

trans-unit.note: This is the label for the text field where the user enters what they were doing at the time of the problem.
This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.

trans-unit.source: I get it. Do not show this again.
Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
trans-unit.target: Tafadhali tambua sampuli ya mpangilio wa mtambo wa kuchapisha hapa chini. Utumia kama mwongozo unapoandaa mtambo wa kuchapisha.

trans-unit.source: Do not use special Asian script word breaking
trans-unit.target: Usitumie uvunjaji wa neno maalum kwa hati ya kiasia

trans-unit.source: This script is right to left
trans-unit.target: Hati hii imeandikwa kutoka kulia kwenda kushoto
Hati hii inahitaji mistari mirefu zaidi

trans-unit.source: Funded by the local community only
trans-unit.target: Imefadhiliwa na jamii ya karibu tu

trans-unit.source: None. Bloom will not show Enterprise features.
trans-unit.target: Hakuna. Bloom haitaonyesha vipengele vya Enterprise.

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Bloom Enterprise huongeza vipengele na huduma ambazo ni muhimu kwa wachapishaji, serikali, na mashirika ya kimataifa. Usajili huu unaolipiwa unakidhi mahitaji yao ya kipekee huku ukisaidia ujenzi na msaada kwa utumiaji wa Bloom kwa jamii kwa ujumla.

trans-unit.note: Should be translated similarly as TeamCollection.TeamCollection, but plural instead of singular

trans-unit.source: This book is available for editing

trans-unit.note: ID: TemplateBooks.BookName.The Moon and the Cap

trans-unit.source: Use for comprehension testing on devices.
trans-unit.target: Tumia kwa upimaji wa ufahamu kwenye vifaa.

trans-unit.source: A blank page that allows you to add items.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa ulio mtupu unaokuruhusu kuongeza vipengee.

trans-unit.source: This page was automatically inserted because the following page is marked as part of a two page spread.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa huu uliingizwa kiotomatiki kwa sababu ukurasa ufuatao umewekwa alama kama sehemu ya kuenea kwa kurasa mbili.

trans-unit.source: Page with a picture on top and a large, centered word below.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa ulio na picha juu na jina kubwa lilioandikwa katikati hapa chini.
Kwa matumizi na mwelekeo wa ukurasa mlalo.

trans-unit.source: An interactive page with a question and some answers. Works on the web and Bloom Reader. When used with Bloom Reader, your project's dashboard can show aggregated comprehension scores.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa wa maingiliano ulio na swali na majibu kadhaa. Unafanya kazi kwenye wavuti na kwenye Bloom Reader. Unapotumiwa na Bloom Reader, dashibodi ya mradi wako inaweza kuonyesha alama za jumla za ufahamu.

trans-unit.source: An interactive page with an image and some text buttons.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa wa maingiliano wenye picha na baadhi ya vitufe vya maandishi.

trans-unit.source: An interactive page with a text and some picture buttons.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa wa maingiliano wenye maandishi na baadhi ya vitufe vya picha.

trans-unit.source: A page of instructions to translators which appears only in the Edit tab.
trans-unit.target: Ukurasa wa maagizo kwa watafsiri ambao unaonekana tu kwenye kichupo cha Hariri.

trans-unit.note: This label indicates a page with one arithmetic problem on it.
This label indicates a page with two arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with three arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with four arithmetic problems on it.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will create a spreadsheet containing the text and images of this book. You can then make changes, like making new translations. Finally, use the “Import & Update from Spreadsheet...” command to bring your changes back in.
trans-unit.target: Bloom itatengeza lahajedwali lililo na maandishi na picha za kitabu hiki. Kisha unaweza kufanya mabadiliko, kama vile kufanya tafsiri mpya. Hatimaye, tumia "Leta & Sasisho kutoka kwa Lahajedwali... "amri ya kurejesha mabadiliko yako.
